title: Cult of Skyuss
text:
A cult who worship the great worm Skyuss. They wish to feed the snow worms by any means.
Snow worms normally attack other prey than humans but aurora’s attract and enrage them. The cult uses this to cause night time attacks where they would like through auro generators.


Incubator cultist of Skyuss
(3 HP, Choke 5: see incubation trait)

Knife (worst of 2D6 damage)
Wrapped up in fur clothing
Purple eggs visibly jutting out from their skin.

INCUBATION: These cultists are so devout to the rising of Skyuss they have grafted snow worms eggs onto their skin. When they are killed they release 1 Premature Snow worm swarm. If they choke they will release 2, the cultist dying in the process.



Mutated cultist of Skyuss
(3 HP)

M1 Thompson submachine gun (1D6 damage)
Large circular maw of diamond teeth for crush (1D6 + 1 damage)
Piercing crazed purple eyes
Sparse diamond plating on purple skin (1 ARMOR)
Cryophobic, takes damage from the cold.

DIAMOND-BONED: These cultists ingested snow worm eggs to gain their power. These mutations led to their bones becoming replaced by smaller interlocking diamond bones. These mutants can fit through incredibly tight passages and holes allowing them to escape and hide effectively.



Deacon of Skyuss
(6 HP, 2 armour)

Aurora gun (1D6+2 damage, STUN)
A holy figure covered in purple robes
Purple eyes are the only sign of Snow worm influence on her body

WORM-FIDDLER: Deacons want to cultivate the worms to adulthood before unleashing them upon the towns, then cities, then the world. However, once at least 10 cultists have been killed they will activate their Aurora generator tower in a desperate attempt to stop FIST.
STUN weapon tag: Those damaged by this weapon cannot move or act until their current HP changes.

Aurora generator
(20 HP, 2 armour)
This large device produces an artificial Aurora to attract Snow Worms. This can be focussed anywhere within a 5 mile radius of the generator at night. Whilst activated will attract 1 Juvenile Snow Worm every 5 minutes. It can even attract larger snow worms if present.
The device also sends out an ultrasonic frequency that deters snow worms from getting within 20 feet of the generator. Deactivation codes are held by the presiding Deacon of Skyuss.




Premature Snow Worm swarm
(3 HP)

Bite (1D6-2 damage, min 1)
2 foot purple worms with Leach-like mouths.
Cryophobic, takes damage from the cold
Will attack all humans indiscriminately

LEACH: These purple worms are like half a metre long with leach like mouths. They are soft lacking the diamond rods and teeth of their older forms. When the swarm bites someone they attach and leach blood and heat from the victim, wrapping around appendages. They will attack other snow worms on the same host. Will deal 1 damage every day if not removed.



Juvenile Snow Worm
(6 HP)

Large circular maw of diamond teeth for crushing (1D6 + 1 damage)
10 foot purple snow worm
Covered in diamond rods and purple scales (1 ARMOR)
Rods also act as sensory organ picking up vibrations
Cryophobic, takes damage from the cold
Aurora-philic, Attracted and enraged by the Aurora lights
Will attack all humans indiscriminately
Deathly territorial, only permitting one other snow worm

TUNNELLER: The snow worm keeps warm in cold climes by efficiently digging through snow, dirt, and rocks. If damaged for 3 or more damage it will escape into the ground only to re-emerge and attack from a different direction.



Adult Snow Worm
(15 HP)

Large circular maw of diamond teeth for crushing (1D6 + 2 damage)
100 foot purple snow worm
Covered in thick diamond rods and purple scales (2 ARMOR)
Rods also act as sensory organ picking up vibrations
Cryophobic, takes damage from the cold
Aurora-philic, Attracted and enraged by the Aurora lights
Usually hunts larger game than humans
Deathly territorial, only permitting one other snow adult worm
Can reproduce sexually and asexually, laying eggs it does not care for

DIAMOND-DRILL: The Snow Worm can naturally grow diamonds. It quickly drills through snow, ice, ground, and rocks. It is fast enough to keep up with a car whilst drilling but slow on top of ground.
SCRAPE (BOSS MOVE): The Adult Snow Worm can scrape its diamond rods against multiple enemies dealing 1D6 DAMAGE to each.



Ultrasonic harmonic frequency grenade
(Consumable item)
This grenade sends out an adjustable ultrasonic frequency. It can be set to a frequency that will destroy the diamond rods of Snow worms if the users knows the frequency. This will decrease the snow worm’s armour by 1 and deal 1D6 damage.
The grenade can be used on other solid objects, bye bye bones!
It contains a reusable harmonic frequency detector (as long as grenade has not been used). Requires touching the grenade to the object tested.

title: TAG: The Arrows of Gaia
text:
Climate change and environmental destructions are existential threats to all life on earth. TAG are an organisation of eco warriors. Primarily they carry out peaceful protests and other activities that benefit the environment.
Their slogan is “you’re it” . ON one hand referring to those they are targeting or will target next. And on the other a call of action for everyone else to join the environmental fight.
Some members form more radical groups that sabotage environmentally damaging facilities such as oil pipes, chemical production companies, etc.

TAG Protestor
(3 HP, CHOKE 5: Scatter and hide)

Placard & leaflets
Unassuming clothing with a cap
Snacks and drinks
Loud and proud

CONVICTED: Many protesters have been previously imprisoned for their convictions. They can be majorly disruptive but people will only deal with them if given orders they can’t refuse. A touch from a group of protesters will cause most to join the protest. Many that join this way leave with a very foggy memory of it all.



TAG Eco Fighter
(4 HP, 1D6 appear)

Winchester Model 1200 Pump-action shotgun (1D6+1 DAMAGE)
Molotov cocktail (1D6 DAMAGE, one use)
Hunting apparel with backpack
Binoculars
Normal men and women who look like hunters
Signs of damage by industrial exploitation

JUSTIFIED: Eco warriors stand up for what is right. They have been harmed by industrial chemicals or machines. With nothing left they will put down their lives to ensure life will continue. They will never surrender, either fighting till the end or retreating to fight another day. Intimidation tactics never work of eco warriors.



TAG Hacker
(5 HP)

PB silenced pistol (1D6 DAMAGE)
Hacker’s axe (1D6+1 DAMAGE, ELECTRIFIED)
Concealed bullet resistant vest (1 ARMOR)
Hard helmet (accessory)
Floppy disk wallet (5 uses)
Phreak whistle
Mobile phone and voice changer
Lumberjack attire

HACKED-OFF: Society is all a farce! A game this hacker now knows how to play. Incredible skills in hacking computers, phone lines, and social situations make them perfect agents for TAG. However, they must be kept on a short leash as they don’t hack for what is right but rather because they have been wronged. Hackers will quickly changed side if given enough incentives in finances, safety, and comfortability.
ELECTRIFIED weapon tag: Deals double DAMAGE to robots and other complex machines. Shorts out running electronics and briefly electrifies bodies of water.
Floppy disk wallet item: Contains 5 floppy disks. Each disk is consumed when used to try to hack a computer system with a floppy disk input. Each disk has a single word indicating its effect; Ransom ware, Decrypt, Virus, Login, and Loop. The effect of each floppy disk is detremined by the circumstance, imagination of the players, result of relvant action roll, and the referee’s decision.



TAG Leader
(6 HP)

Steyr AUG assault rifle (1D6+1 DAMAGE)
Blade of grass, sword (2D6 DAMAGE, RITUAL)
Tactical vest (1 ARMOR)
Enchanted wood shield (2 ARMOR, equip as weapon)
Blowing horn, calls forth the largest nearby land animals (1 use)
Long flowing hair framing a beautiful face
Gentle but commanding voice

TAMER: Able to keep TAG fighters in line this leader is vital to TAG violent activities. They can tame and enlarge multiple wild creatures of the same species with the blessing of Gaia. If the TAG Leader is killed or knocked unconscious the effect will immediately end.
RITUAL weapon tag: Shatters to protect you from death once, negating lethal damage. Disintegrates afterward.

title: Gaia
text:
Life was created by the combination of light, earth, and water. Gaia is life and yearns for unity. Its followers, Gaians, interpret this in many ways. As always unity brings division.
Most followers cherish life. They farm, heal others, protect the environment, etc. Some think death is the great unifier and praise the degraders and carrion feeders. An even smaller subset hold hard to the wheel of life.

title: History
text:
WWII ends with nuclear bombing of Japan, unleashing kaiju from the DOT. The population of Japan is evacuated. Thankfully the Kaiju are kept land bound on the main Japan island by the powers of Gaia & Proteus.
Due to this Nuclear weapons are banned by world governments leading to uneasy peace. This leads to the formation of major superpowers.

USA: United States of America. The number one superpower consisting of all the Americas
CAC: Coalition of African Countries. All of Africa.
ERA: European & Russian Alliance. Europe & Russia.
SAE: Supreme Asian Empire. All Asian countries except Russia with India & China co-leading uneasily.
Oceania: Australia, New Zealand, Tasmania, and other small islands.
British Isles: England, Scotland, Ireland, Wales, Greenland, Iceland, and other smaller islands. Also known as the biway.

The financial hub of the world. A great place for off shore bank accounts and laundering money.
A haven for fugitives of other countries with capital.
Many of the world’s elites and most dangerous live here benefitting from interacting with each other.
Violent crimes are not tolerated in the British isles A great place for FIST to be based but in one of the less wealthy areas (Ireland, Wales, Isle of Man, or Isle of Wight).
Greenland is used for nuclear power generation to sell to the world (primarily the USA) and to keep armies stationed.
Iceland is where many more dangerous scientific research is carried out.


Space travel was expedited due to the world governments working together to carry it out. The Japanese refugees took this as an opportunity to create a new home as the first settlers on the moon at the start of the 1960s. They have 2 major metropolises there called Usagi (Rabbit) and Kaguya. They specialise in combustion light-gas guns (large cannons with high velocity) and mechs. When they are ready they plan to take back Japan.

title: AWE: Auroras & Worm Eradication
text: Snow sport enthusiasts are being found dead with shark like bites at the Aurora ski resort in Skifry, Canada. Refraction Sports are planning to hold a televised event next year at the Aurora. They want these deaths to stop.

title: AWE: Auroras & Worm Eradication
text:
What is going on?
Keep the information in this section unknown to the players unless you want to drop them straight into the action.
An abandoned radio tower outpost in the mountains has been taken over by the Cult of Skyuss. They are an extreme branch of Gaians. They are breeding worms and experimenting on their use.
The Deacon (Anne Lida) has been testing out the Aurora generator which attracts and enrages the snow worms, This has lead to the deaths of skiers, and snowboarders. They plan to grow snow worms and unleash a plague of them on the world.
To successfully stop these attacks the team will need to figure out what is going on and Kill Anne Lida, a Deacon of Skyuss.

title: AWE: Auroras & Worm Eradication
text:
Reward
Aurora diamond sword (1D6+1 DAMAGE, VALUABLE)
VALUABLE weapon tag: Utterly unique in history or make. Can be used as a bargaining chip in almost any situation.

title: AWE: Auroras & Worm Eradication
text:
Consequences
If the cult is not stopped they will grow and appear in other areas across the globe. This will start with cold climes but spread to everywhere else if not stopped.
Snow worms have frequented these mountain ranges for centuries. Without the cults’ influence the snow worms will not be able to escape these mountain tops as the underground hot springs restrict their range (see more below). Their population will stay low and they will mostly hunt larger game (bears, moose etc).

title: AWE: Auroras & Worm Eradication
text:
Intel gatheirng
Our FIST team will need to figure out what is going on. They can do a lot of intel gathering at the Aurora. I also encourage you to make up other stuff based on the suggestions of your players.

The Aurora
The Aurora is a ski resort run by the Daman family. The main building is a post-modern brutalism building of concrete and colour. The Damans have been told to accommodate the team and help with intel gathering.
Some possible clues include:

Security guards: Know the locations and dates of skier and snowboarder deaths. Each was skiing/snowboarding in the dark before found dead. Some bodies were not found at all.
Dotters of Nyxmera stargaze every night on top of resort building. They have noticed localised Auroras. Many match nights when people went missing/found dead.

The team can freely rent use snow mobiles (3 HP, 2 ARMOR) and other skiing/snowboarding gear provided by The Aurora during the mission.


Skifry
Skifry is a secluded mountain town with a logo of a purple dragon bathed by the aurora. The town was founded in these mountains due to the underground hot spring acting a natural way to heat the town and produce electricity. Unfortunately, the underground hot spring are also the reason the cryophilic snow worms can so easily survive the cold climate here.
The Aurora makes use of the hot water and citizens of Skifry.
Some possible clues include:

Library at city hall: News articles about a radio tower abandoned in the 30s due to unexplained animal attacks.
Recruiters for cult: Will try to recruit the players to the cult. They are careful and coy as they are currently normal humans.
Hospital & morgue: Recent body of a victim.
Indigenous centre: The resident story teller has the following story if asked about tales of worms.

The native Waawate & Icelandic Jokla were a warlock pair of great power. They vanquished the mighty ice worm. Waawate summoned the Northern lights to attract the beast. Then Jokla encased it in ice.

Strange shopper: A strange very wrapped up individual (Mutated cultists of Skyuss) going into the food store to buy a lot of meat, potatoes, and canned food.

title: AWE: Auroras & Worm Eradication
text:
Outpost
Feel free to use the below, edit it, or make your own. Enemy stats and items are here: Cult of Skyuss.
The Cult of Skyuss’ outpost is an abandoned radio tower within a forest a mile above the ski slopes, on top of a ridge. An old road leads to it but otherwise snow mobiles can be used to reach the outpost.
The outpost is a square concrete 2 floor building with an inner outdoor square dominated by a radio tower. The outpost is surrounded by a barbed wire topped fence with gate. Its insides and outside are littered with detritus and garbage. There is little else so the cult can make the place look abandoned.
Inside is a buzz of activity and kept very hot with many radiators. A garage is connected to the main building which contains a large SUV (8 HP, 1 ARMOR).

Lower floor
The lower floor contains 6 rooms with one hallway touching the inner walls. The rooms only connect to the hallway (except one stair case). A couple Mutated cultists of Skyuss patrol the hall and rooms.
When entering a room use a D6 to determine which room it is from below. Ensure there is only one of each of the 6 rooms.

Room with stairs that lead to the next floor’s hallway.
Incubation room with 3 Incubators of Skyuss.
Incubation room with 2 Incubators of Skyuss.
Recreation room with a table with some cards.
Cult of Skyuss prayer room. Books about the worm eating the planet and Gaian philosophy books.
Boiler room: If boiler is disabled the cultists will desperately try to fix as the cold will slow them down and harm them if cold enough.



Upper floor
The upper floor contains 6 rooms with a hallway touching the outer walls. The rooms only connect to the hallway (except one way into the radio tower). 4 Mutated cultists of Skyuss patrol the halls and rooms, keeping an eye out on the outside via large windows. Another 4 Mutated cultists of Skyuss are awake but on break in rooms.
When entering a room use a D6 to determine which room it is from below. Ensure there is only one of each of the 6 rooms.

This room has a door that leads to a walkway with a ladder up to the radio tower room.
Sleeping quarters: 4 sleeping mutated cultists of Skyuss.
Recreation room: tables for cards, sofas and tv, and a library. Contains a book on paranormal creatures.
Kitchen: First aid spray present (heal 1D6, consumable)
Makeshift armoury: M1 Thompson submachine gun (1D6 damage) & 1 combat helmet (1 ARMOR, accessory) present
Research room: A place where the deacon experiments on worms. Notes on snow worms and altered cultists are present. Also 2 Ultrasonic harmonic frequency grenades.



Radio tower room
This is a warm room where the Deacon of Skyuss orchestrates plans and controls their Aurora generator. It contains the radio tower controls and a ceiling hatch leading to the top of the tower.
The deacon’s aurora generator is mounted on the top of the tower. Accessible by a metal ladder.

title: AWE: Auroras & Worm Eradication
text:
Worm attacks
If Anne Lida (Deacon) has activated the aurora generator, every time a Juvenile Snow Worm appears roll a D6 to determine which room in the lower floor they emerge into. There are a total of 4 Juvenile Snow Worms that will appear. The generator can be turned off or broken to cause the worms to dig away.
If all 4 Juvenile Snow Worms appear the single living Adult Snow Worm will appear attacking worms then humans. The cult have been finding its eggs for their breeding program.

title: POPS: Possible Oil Pipe Sabotage
text:
Hired by Kraken (Dotters of Tartarus) to prevent sabotage by Gaians.
Hired by TAG (Gaians) to sabotage pipeline.

3 different stations along the straight pipeline. They are situated within the Black Forest.

title: POPS: Possible Oil Pipe Sabotage
text:
Hired by Kraken (Dotters of Tartarus) to prevent sabotage by Gaians.
Hired by TAG (Gaians) to sabotage pipeline.

3 different stations along the straight pipeline. They are situated within the Black Forest.

title: POPS: Possible Oil Pipe Sabotage
text:
Gaian sabotaging
The team will need to hack into 3 different small stations along the pipeline. They will be provided 4 eight inch floppy disks, 1 needed for each hack.
Two pairs of Kraken security guards at each base. If the alarm goes off, Kraken private contractors will appear in SUVs, this will take a bit of time.
At the last station there will be a Metal Ore Talos. It will not be alert if the alarm has not gone off. It will never fire if the oil pipeline is in the line of fire.

Rewards
M1 Garand semi-automatic rifle (1D6+1 DAMAGE, MEDICAL)
MEDICAL weapon tag: Once per mission, you may use this weapon to deal negative DAMAGE, healing the target.

title: POPS: Possible Oil Pipe Sabotage
text:
Kraken Defence
Defend one station from 3 waves. The team will have access to an imprisoned TAG spy .
The team should be encouraged to set up traps and defences. Other plans are encouraged. A much easier mission but will definitely involve combat.
Waves:

1D6 TAG Eco Fighters.
2D6 TAG Eco Fighters & 1 TAG Hacker


Hacker will try to hack any electronic systems from afar during attack. They may even phone the mercs to try and trick them in some way before the 2nd wave.


1D6 TAG Eco Fighters per FIST merc & 1 TAG Leader.


All the units of this wave are riding tamed enlarged wild boars by the TAG leader’s ability. They are enlarged and tamed as long as the TAG leader is conscious.
Enlarged boar: 4HP, 1 ARMOR, 1D6 damage from charge.
Wild board: 3HP, worst-of-2D6 damage damage from charge.


Rewards
Ruger Hawkeye hand cannon (1D6+1 DAMAGE, QUICK-DRAW)
QUICK-DRAW weapon tag: Attacks that target enemies drawing their weapons will always succeed.

title: Missions
text:
This section contains various missions. A list of the missions is below:
POPS: Possible Oil Pipe Sabotage: Either side with Kraken to prevent an oil pipe sabotage of TAG to do the sabotaging.
AWE: Auroras & Worm Eradications: A Refraction Sports event may be stopped due to skiers and snowboarders being found eaten by beasts. Found out what’s going on and stop it.

title: Followers
text:
Sun of Nyxmera
(3 HP, CHOKE 3: Stare and applaud)

Large mobile phone
Camera
Binoculars
Casual clothing with eyes in space theme

GAWKER: These followers of Nyxmera act as eyes of the deity and nothing more. They mindlessly consume content and go out of their way to witness danger. They will call in further Suns of Nyxmera if they see a dangerous event possibly causing further civilian casualties.



Mouth of Nyxmera
(3 HP, CHOKE 4: Escape from current situation and lie low)

Laser finger gun (worst of 2D6 DAMAGE)
Hard light shard (Teleport user to a pre designated place within 1 mile, 1 use,).
Very extravagant and bombastic
Outwardly Friendly to friends and aggressive to enemies

CAPRICIOUS: Leaders amongst the followers of Nyxmera. They tend to be high up in entertainment or politics. Always keen to cause the most drama they may be a friend of FIST one mission and then an enemy the next. They are in it for the long game and want to remain in Nyxmera’s spotlight for a long time. They will try to create an interesting series of events for Nyxmera to watch.

title: Starvatars
text:
A Starvatar of Nyxmera is the light of a star. When it exists the star’s light can no longer be seen in the night sky as it now exists as a hard light being. Each Starvatar will take the name of its star or constellation.
They are humanoid like being made of the night sky. They are pitch black solid with twinkling lights covering their body. Their legs and arms taper down to points like the human depiction of a star on paper. Invisible digits allow them to handle anything a human could including guns.
All Starvatars of Nyxmera look nearly identical except for their heads. These are in the shape of something related to the human mythology of their star or the constellation it belongs to. On this head is one bright light, the star’s light they use as an eye. Examples of head shapes include:

Zodiac: Leo = Lion, Cancer = Crab , Gemini = Twins, Taurus = bull, Aries = Ram, Pisces = Fish, Aquarius = water carrier, Capricorn = Sea goat, Sagittarius = Centaur, Scorpio = scorpion, Libra = Scales, Virgo = Maiden.
Bear head from Ursa major and minor

Powerful Starvatars can create temporary structures made of hard light

Stavatar of Nyxmera
(9 HP)

Starlight rifle (1D6 + 2 DAMAGE, MEDICAL)
Starlight spear (1D6 + 2 DAMAGE, UNSTABLE)
Hard light armor (2 ARMOR)

SHADOWMAKER: The star avatar’s body is that of the night sky. The shape of its head matches the mythology of the star or constellation it comes from. Upon this head is one eye made from the light of its star. It casts a great light from its eye and body. However shadows caused by this are irrationally dark and cannot be illuminated by other lights.


Purple Moon of Nyxmera


A humanoid of night sky larger than a blue whale.
Its head is a purple crated orb, the purple moon.

VOYEUR: Depictions of the past show the purple moon in the night sky. Now it perpetually lives as the ultimate representation of Nyxmera. None can question its authority within the suns of Nyxmera and few can match its power outside. It lives in its massive estate filled with theatres, cinemas, libraries, rooms full of TVs. Only the best are allowed to entertain the Purple Moon, and only the richest can join the viewing. They love sowing drama and comedy, having taken to trolling on elite chat boards. The purple moon can see anything and everything bathed by the Grey Moon’s light.

title: Troops
text:
Nyxmera Trooper
(3 HP, 2D6 appear)

Semi-Auto Laser rifle (Choose 1 of 2D6 DAMAGE, 1D6 DAMAGE for other users)
Meteor scrap metal armor (1 ARMOR)
Rifle mounted light (Directional close range sight in the dark)
Black and white fatigues, covered in scraps of meteor metal.

DUALITY: These troopers embody the day and night extremes of Nyxmera. They will shoot allies and enemies alike with their laser rifles. When dealing damage with these they harm the target on even totals and heal the target on odd totals. Normally the referee will choose which die to use. However, if a player adds one or more WAR DICE they choose which single dice to remove from the DAMAGE.


Nyxmera Light Trooper
(3 HP, 1D6 appear)

Laser shotgun (1D6 + 1 DAMAGE)
1D6 stun grenades (temporary blinding, one use)
Helmet mounted lantern (close range sight in the dark)
Meteor metal armor (2 ARMOR)
Hard light projector (1 use)

STEADFAST: These heavy troopers stand strong against the dark. They routinely use the combination of their lanterns and hard light projectors to corner enemies.
Hardlight wall generator weapon: A heavy 2 handed device that can create a 2 ARMOR 5 foot tall by 10 foot wide hard light wall projection 10 feet in front of the device. It must be continuously fired whilst the user is illuminated. Due to the weight of the hard light the wall must be kept on the ground for normal humans. The hard light is frictionless and so can be moved slowly by the user.


Nyxmera Dark Trooper
(6 HP)

Meteor sword (1D6 + 1 DAMAGE, LIGHT)
Night vision goggles (see at night)
Light diffraction weave bodysuit (1 ARMOR, difficult to see)
Shadow boots (Can teleport from one shadow to another within a range of 30 feet, 1 use)
Deployable hard light hoverboard (accessory)

PATIENT: The dark trooper will watch and stalk enemies. It will bide its time for the best opportunity to reveal itself based on how cool it would be. If it begins a fight with no backup it will take no DAMAGE from the first attack against them, doing a narly flip or trick to evade it.

title: Nyxmera
text:
Nyxmera is the light, literally. All the celestial bodies are known as the eyes of Nyxmera, the sun, the grey and purple moons, the planets and the stars. With these Nyxmera watches, they want to be entertained.
However, some think that these physical objects are Nyxmera but they are mistaken. It is the light that comes from these that make Nyxmera. And even though Nyxmera spans all of space it is stuck in a perpetual gaze. No wonder it sends its starvatars to Earth for some fun.
Its logo represents the duality of the sky and Nyzmera’s eyes. On one side the blue sky and sun. On the other the night sky with the Grey Moon and Purple Moon. The Purple Moon now permanently resides on earth as the supreme Starvartar of Nyxmera.

The two-sided deity of night and day
Loves extremes of good and evil, conflict, and drama
Followers: Suns of Nyxmera

Followers include navigators, space enthusiasts, story tellers, and entertainers

Good factions

Generally do very visible good such as disaster relief, peace keeping, good police etc.

Bad factions

Generally do evil in the dark such as war, human trafficking

Best followers

Those who do extreme good and evils
Examples include

Good cops that are also very corrupt
Actors who bring joy to the public but have a dark private side

title: Pumice construction Ltd.
text:
A construction company run by Proteans and Dotters of Tartarus. They have amazing technologies that has shaped society.
They have a special concrete production method that allows them to shape and colour concrete in amazing ways. This has led to the boom of post modern brutalism. Additionally, they can easily melt concrete back to a liquid form allowing them to constantly change and/or replace buildings with relative ease.
For roads and foundations they are able to make a tough wearing igneous rock from lava and water.
These are energy hungry practices but with the abundance of nuclear energy in the world it is not an issue.

title: Refraction Sports
text:
A sports company specialising in snow and water sports. This company, its competitors, and fans consist of many Suns of Nyxmera and Proteans. It combines the go with the flow of these sports with the exhilarating voyeurism.

Protean Surfer (3 HP, CHOKE 6: Irreversibly change into a puddle of water)
NEEDS COMPLETEING

Bottle of Holy water (1 use)
Sunglasses and Surfer necklace
Always seems at least slightly stoned

GAWKER: These followers of Nyxmera act as eyes of the deity and nothing more. They mindlessly consume content and go out of their way to witness danger. They will call in further Suns of Nyxmera if they see a dangerous event possibly causing further civilian casualties.


Protean Snowboarder (3 HP, CHOKE 6: Collapse into a snowball)
NEEDS COMPLETEING

Bottle of Holy water (1 use)
Sunglasses and Surfer necklace
Always seems at least slightly stoned

GAWKER: These followers of Nyxmera act as eyes of the deity and nothing more. They mindlessly consume content and go out of their way to witness danger. They will call in further Suns of Nyxmera if they see a dangerous event possibly causing further civilian casualties.

title: Triton & Delta
text:
A large company developing and selling drugs, both licit and illicit. It is an open secret they sell illicit drugs with many knowing Triton as the licit side and Delta as the Illicit side. They primarily create new drugs charging many local companies to produce, and distribute.
This is not only led by Proteans but many Gaians involved in health services. However, Gaian involvement normally is limited to the licit side.
Holy water bottle (consumable) item: Drink to get +1 on your next REFLEXIVE roll. You have a X-IN-1D6 chance of turning into a puddle of water when you drink it, effectively dying. X = the amount of Holy water bottles you have previously drunk in the mission. 1st drink is 0-IN-1D6, 2nd is 1-IN-1D6, etc.

title: Water bodies
text: Each water body of Proteus represents a different body of water on earth. They are animated blobs of water. However, their structure is given to their form by the presence of water life such as plants and fish.

title: Water bodies
text: Each water body of Proteus represents a different body of water on earth. They are animated blobs of water. However, their structure is given to their form by the presence of water life such as plants and fish.

title: Proteus
text:
The elusive ever changing deity of water. Proteus goes with the flow, loathing stagnation and overworking. Proteus is ever changing, and agreeable. It is happy to be manipulated by others. Whether forming into cloud by the sun, falling down a mountain or becoming steam by lava this occurs to water. But when it is affected by others it will leave its own mark. Beaches formed by the interaction of the moon, water, and land. Clouds blocking the sun. Formation of Islands with magma. In this changing way Proteus brings life but it can take it away. The weakness of proteus is it is frozen in the absence of heat and evaporates with too much.
The followers of Proteus are called Proteans. Due to their philosophies their organisations tend to be smaller. However, they have a lot of smaller organisations and groups. Followers include: Pharmaceutical workers, Dealers and enjoyers of alcohol and drugs, water and snow sports enthusiasts, sailors, navy, sanitation workers, climatologists, and firefighters.
Proteans play well with other factions and you will see them regularly team up with other faction organisations. Examples include; Construction with Tartarus, Healthcare with Gaia, and extreme sports events with Nyxmera.

Followers: Proteans

Followers include: Pharmaceutical workers, Dealers and enjoyers of alcohol and drugs, water and snow sports enthusiasts, sailors, navy, sanitation workers, climatologists, and firefighters.

Good activities

Pharmaceuticals
Keeping things clean

Evil activities

Illicit drug dealing

title: DOT raiders
text:
Settlements of people who live in the DOT. They raid the surface for food and supplies. May also free modern day slaves and carry out prison breaks.

Tartarus raider
(3 HP, 3D6 appear)

M1911 pistol (1D6 DAMAGE)
Obsidian blade (1D6 DAMAGE)
Thunderstick, explosive throwing spear (1D6 + 2 DAMAGE, ANTI-MATERIAL, 1 use)
Scrap armor (1 ARMOR)
Scrap armored school bus (12 HP, 2 ARMOR)

HIT-AND-RUN: Raider war cries act as a harbinger of destruction. After a rapid pillage they scarper off leaving any wounded behind. They never abduct living things. The literal definition of scrappy, they like to bicker between themselves over loot. Tartarus raiders are good drivers and only use their thundersticks on pursuing vehicles, not wanting to destroy any possible loot.



Tartarus fire warriors
(6 HP)

Flame thrower (1D6 + 1 DAMAGE, INCENDIARY)
Napalm grenade (1D6 + 2 DAMAGE, 1 use)
Pyrogen fire suppression grenade. Can douse fire in a medium enclosed area such as a skip or caravan (1 use)
Reinforced silver fire suit (1 ARMOR)
Bottled fire spirit, 1 DAMAGE to user, heals target +1D6 HP (1 use)
Inhibited movement and vision

BURNT: These warriors have been wronged and fight for justice. They have little self preservation thinking their suits will prevent any dangerous burns. They are fiercely defensive of their allies and will attract aggro. Whilst a Tartarus fire warrior is alive and in combat, attacks to non Taratarus fire warriors have -1 DAMAGE.



Tartarus magnetic slinger
(4 HP)

Long range gauss rifle, requires a bright and loud charge up time (1D6 + 2 DAMAGE, ARMOR PIERCING)
Tripwire grenade (1D6 + 1 DAMAGE, 1 use)
Smoke grenade (1 use)
Flare gun (3 uses)
Ghillie suit
Sluggish and cramped legs.

VOLCANIC: Like a volcano this slinger is patient and difficult to detect whilst dormant. However their weapon provides an obvious signal to their target a few seconds before they can fire. Will use their flare gun to call for backup or attract prey.



Scrapper
TO BUILD: A mechanic who takes care of the cars and builds weapons with scraps. Can attack with their wrench and make various scrap based items during combat.

title: Followers
text:
Dotter of Tartarus
(3 HP, CHOKE 4: Find the nearest hole to cower in)

Climbing pickaxe (3 DAMAGE)
Spelunking gear
Loupe (magnifying glass for gems)
Lockpick gear
Caving suit

EXPLORER: These followers of Tartarus are always on the lookout for entrances to the DOT, possible mining sites, and the enslaved to free. They seem to appear from nowhere and will interrogate anyone they see. They will follow the interrogatee, being near impossible to lose, until their questions have been answered.



Elder Dotter of Tartarus
(3 HP, CHOKE 4: Escape from current situation)

Rock fists (1D6 DAMAGE)
Rock armor (2 ARMOR)
Clean suits adorned with jewellery
Quick to defend their actions with the free market, meaning different things to capitalists and raiders

COVETOUS: Elder dotters are rich and powerful. Many are the CEOs of mining, fossil fuel, and nuclear companies on the surface and leaders of raiding settlements in the DOT. Whether they raid or capitalise others they will take the riches of Tartarus without laboring themselves. They are particularly fond of hoarding precious stones and metals. Their rock fists and armors are blessings from Taratarus that only they can manifest over their body and use.

title: Kraken
text:
Kraken is a large energy and mining corporation. They deal in oil and nuclear power. They also mine for oil, nuclear ores, metal ores, and gems. The CEO is Marian Dullcoin (Elder Dotter of Tartarus).

Kraken security guard
(4 HP, 2 appear)

Bioresonance disruptor rifle (1D6+1 DAMAGE, BIOLOGICAL)
Hazard foam grenade launcher, able to fill holes, quench fires, block radiation, and slow down foes (3 uses)
Hazard suit (1 ARMOR)
Hard hat (accessory)
High vis jacket
Half a key card each
Prone to ask ridiculous either or questions with their buddy (“Would you rather fight a horse sized duck or 100 duck sized horses?”)

SAFETY BUDDIES: Two guards make a whole. For security they are each given half of any security passes so both must be present, stopping 1 captured/pilfered guard from allowing breaches. They can and will use their hazard foam grenades to subdue trespassers.
BIOLOGICAL weapon trait: Only damages biological beings. Cannot damage structures, vehicles, or chemicals.



Kraken private contractor
(4 HP, 1D6 appear)

Heckler & Koch MP5K submachine gun (1D6 DAMAGE)
Combat knife (1D6 DAMAGE)
Kevlar military vest (1 ARMOR)
Battering ram (1D6 DAMAGE)
Kept in reserve until combat starts
Trigger happy swat wannabes

CQC: Rush into close quarter combat as they want the bonus for killing any enemies. With their battering ram they can break through any unbarricaded hinged door with abandon.

title: Taloes
text:
Taloes (singula talos) of Tartarus are made from the bounties of Tartarus. They generally consist of local resources.

Metal Ore Talos (11 HP)

Heavy machine gun (1D6+2 DAMAGE, UNSTABLE)
Warhammer (1D6+2 DAMAGE)
Ore body (2 ARMOR)
Mostly stationary and slow to react
A crude approximation of a human in iron ore form.

TOWER: It is a crude approximation of a human form made of dirt and local ores. Instead of legs, its body is a great pillar that can slowly shuffle over the ground. Although slow in movement they compensate with their unrelenting fire. If its enemies take cover it will slowly approach and destroy the cover with its warhammer dealing 2 DAMAGE from shrapnel to those behind it.



Obsidian Lava Talos (6 HP)

Obsidian arm blades (1D6+2 DAMAGE)
Obsidian lava spear (2D6 DAMAGE, talos takes one damage when used, 1 use)
Obsidian scales (1 ARMOR)

GLASSBLOWER: The true form of this talos is formless lava. The talos can change any lava that is part of it or touches it to obsidian of any shape. With this ability it creates an obsidian based skeleton, armor, and weapons. Additionally, it can change obsidian back into lava.



Lithium Talos (3 HP, 2D6 appear)

Explosive spit (1D6 DAMAGE)

CASCADE: These blobs of lithium like to hide in crevasses and behind rocks. They will wait till their prey are surrounded by them before attacking. When they die they explode for 3 DAMAGE, this may cause a cascade of explosions from all the Lithium taloes. Many cave-ins have been known to occur due to this.



Radioactive Gem Talos (9 HP)

Plasma rifle (2D6 DAMAGE, NUCLEAR-POWERED)
Power armor (2 ARMOR, NUCLEAR-POWERED)
Quartz, amethyst, violet fluorite, blue salt, yellow sapphires or green diamond core.

PROJECTION: A radioactive projection produced from a single gem at their core. Although the most human looking of all the taloes they are also the most terrifying. They give off constant nuclear radiation which they use to power their weapons and armor. Anyone within melee range gets -2 to action rolls and loses 1HP per action.
GEM: Their real body is their gem which has 3HP. If this is not destroyed the talos will reform in 1D6 days. Its gear is not part of its projection.

title: Tartarus
text:
Tartarus is the ground we live on, they are the rocks, dirt, metal, and oil. Tartarus was once free with explosive energy but now lays dormant, encaged by the sky, trapped by Nyxmera. Tartarus loathes Nyxmera and Nyxmera’s apathy towards Tartarus fuels its bottled rage further.
The greatest presence of Tartarus is felt underground where Nyxmera cannot see with its eyes. Here you may find a deep black hole that leads to the DOT. The DOT is the Domain Of Taratarus. Time and space are inconsistent in the DOT. You may enter and subsequently leave in the past, present or future no matter how long you were in the DOT. Many monsters live in the DOT. Think Journey to the Center of the Earth, Narnia, the Fey Wild, The underdark etc.
World governments have used the DOT as a dumping ground for garbage, scientific waste, and nuclear waste. This has lead to mutated humans and creatures due to the combination of radiation, chemicals, and the magic of the DOT. They mostly stay contained in the DOT but occasionally cause havoc on the surface.

The imprisoned deity of the earth.
A seemingly calm surface with extreme power under the surface
Followers: Dotters of Tartarus

Followers include: Enslaved, prisoners, fighters, miners, oil workers, seismologists, & spelunkers

Good activities

Freeing the enslaved
Fight for justice

Evil activities

Raiding the surface
Ruthless capitalism
Destruction of ecology
Prison breaks

Best followers

Raider leader and Kraken higher ups who free modern day slaves and carry out prison breaks.
